name: Leaf Blower Man: This Game Blows!
name_original: Leaf Blower Man: This Game Blows!
description:
Leaf Blower Man is a arcade-action game. Not only will you pointlessly blow leaves from one end of the driveway to the other, you will also earn points by annoying the heck out of your neighbors! A dramatic story will lead you through a variety of environments and challenges; perhaps you might even save humanity?

Replay the short campaign to get MORE points and beat it FASTER! Will you be the bestest Leaf Blower Person?





Aside from the main campaing, enjoy a Horde Mode and fight against an ever-increasing number of militant leaves. Destroy thousands of enemies, strategically gain experience, choose new power-ups / weapons, and try to survive long enough to get to the final Leaf King. Will you topple the tyranny of autumn?






Leaf Blower Man provides a fantastic experience without any pay-to-win microtransactions. Any additional packages available for purchase are completely optional and do not provide any gameplay advantages. We are committed to committing towards this commitment.
